name: CP_2_Render_externally_sourced_Information
title: CP.2 Render externally-sourced Information (Function)
description: Render documentation and data that has been captured from multiple external sources.
purpose: Documentation and data relevant to the patient record can be captured from many external sources and should be rendered appropriately alongside other information in the patient record. External sources are those outside the EHR system, including clinical, administrative, and financial information systems, other EHR systems, Personal Health Record (PHR) systems, and data received through health information exchange networks.

statement.label: CP.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render a tag that patient health information is externally sourced when such information is rendered.
